solution_line_template: If John has twice the number of children Yasmin has, then John has {john_multiplier}*Y = {john_children_factor}Y kids
If we solve the latest equation then we learn that {gabriel_grandkids}={combined_yasmin_john_factor}Y
Given that Y represents how many kids Yasmin has, then solving for Y we know that Y={gabriel_grandkids}/{combined_yasmin_john_factor} or Y={yasmin_children} kids
